ing: 1 (1 ounce) package garlic and mushroom soup mix
1 (14 ounce) can artichoke hearts, drained and chopped
des: "The addition of garlic mushroom soup mix gives this dip some kick! Serve a French baguette, crackers or crostini alongside this steaming dish  to give your guests something to dip into it with."
ins:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
In a 1-1/2 quart casserole dish, combine mayonnaise, sour cream, soup mix, artichoke hearts, cheese and crab meat. Mix well. Bake uncovered for 30 minutes. Serve immediately.
